_xResult.title: Touch of Breeze Maxi Skirt
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made long linen skirt with simple design
_xResult.longdesc:
A kiss of a breeze on your legs in warm, sticky air. Tired and heavy eyes that you let fall closed. A long sip of water after a long nap. The little moments that all make the day truly special. This hand-crafted, artisan made skirt will be one of them.

 

Aiste says "The wholesomeness of the landscape and the vast expanse of nature that surround me is my inspiration. The geometric patterns of the tree trunks in the forest, the rise and fall of the waves in the sea, the colors of the passing seasons: all these elements come together when I produce my hand-sewn fabrics. I begin with rolls of plain material and sew hundreds of small seams onto it, creating my own unique textured cloth.  Apparel from this texturized material will not become wrinkly; wherever you may go, simply pack them to your travel bag.  No additional ironing is needed before you wear this garment."

 

Aiste custom made to measure coats fit better and can be customized for length in most cases. Perfer a longer length or higher waist? Let us know and we can make adjustments.

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash cold. Dry clean ok.
